overview: It's a spoof of the "Scream" movies, but it's more "Cream" than horror, as a young drunkard imagines a whole series of jizz-inducing adventures with his mates. This is one party that's gonna get you pumping your wad in no time!
tagline: Cum And Play With These Li'l Hell Raisers!  These cute devils are hotter than hell!!
title: Cute Devils
